categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Kersin was a male Human who served as a major in Imperial Intelligence, the intelligence branch of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War against the Galactic Republic. During the Quesh war on the planet Quesh, he was stationed at the Imperial Garrison, where he shared his experience and knowledge with Imperial Agents.
Major Kersin appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a class trainer for the Imperial Agent class on Quesh.
